EXPERIENCES.COMPANY_VON_BRAUN_1: Wernher von Braun Advanced Research Center
EXPERIENCES.TASK_1_VON_BRAUN_1: Development of scalable web applications with real-time updates via WebSockets, using Angular 20 and TypeScript.
EXPERIENCES.TASK_2_VON_BRAUN_1: Transformed the dashboard creation workflow by replacing a manual, fragmented process with an integrated drag-and-drop system connected to sensors, using standard components and supporting customization for direct assembly within the application.
EXPERIENCES.TASK_3_VON_BRAUN_1: Ensured code quality through unit and E2E tests (Jest and Cypress), guaranteeing full coverage of critical functionalities.
EXPERIENCES.COMPANY_VON_BRAUN_2: Wernher von Braun Advanced Research Center
EXPERIENCES.TASK_1_VON_BRAUN_2: Developed websites integrating charting libraries and WebSockets for real-time data visualization, using Angular 19 and TypeScript.
EXPERIENCES.TASK_2_VON_BRAUN_2: Implemented a real-time dashboard to monitor S3 file processing, with step-by-step progress and detailed logs, reducing the time for diagnosing and fixing failures.
EXPERIENCES.TASK_3_VON_BRAUN_2: Created automated tests (unit and E2E) ensuring a reduction in production bugs and greater front-end reliability.
EXPERIENCES.TASK_1_PET_UFSCAR: Developed a mobile system to integrate all PETs in Brazil to facilitate activity registration. Technologies: React Native and Flutter.
EXPERIENCES.TASK_2_PET_UFSCAR: Developed a 9x11 board game with movements similar to Chess but with different possibilities. Technologies: JavaScript and Python.

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: I'm a Frontend Developer passionate about creating engaging and intuitive web experiences. I have the satisfaction of transforming designs into functional and responsive interfaces, using, mainly, Angular and Typescript. My goal is to bring ideas to life, ensuring that every website is not only beautiful, but also fast and accessible to all users.

ABOUT_ME.BOOTCAMP_TEXT: I also completed the Santander Coders bootcamp, offered by Ada Tech in partnership with Santander, with a focus on front-end development with Angular and an introduction to Node.js.
ABOUT_ME.UNIVERSITY_TEXT: I graduated in Computer Science from UFSCar, completing the course with a general average of 8.32. During my degree, I participated in academic and extension projects, such as the Tutorial Education Project (PET), where I developed mobile systems and collaborated on the creation of a digital board game using JavaScript.
ABOUT_ME.EXPERIENCE_TEXT: I work at the Von Braun Labs Research Center, where I participate in the construction of scalable web applications, being responsible for the front-end architecture and the implementation of unit and end-to-end tests.
ABOUT_ME.STUDIES_TEXT: I am currently looking to delve deeper into the new features of Angular and expand my knowledge in the back-end with C# and .NET, aiming to become an even more complete developer.
